scripts.build: cross-env REACT_APP_CHAIN_ENV=main CI= GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false craco build
scripts.build:kovan: cross-env REACT_APP_CHAIN_ENV=kovan CI= GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false craco build
scripts.build:online-test: cross-env REACT_APP_CHAIN_ENV=online-test CI= GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false craco build
scripts.build:heco: cross-env REACT_APP_CHAIN_ENV=heco CI= GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false craco build
scripts.build:heco-test: cross-env REACT_APP_CHAIN_ENV=heco-test CI= GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false craco build
scripts.build:bsc: cross-env REACT_APP_CHAIN_ENV=bsc CI= GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false craco build
scripts.build:bsc-test: cross-env REACT_APP_CHAIN_ENV=bsc-test CI= GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false craco build
scripts.pkg:online: rm -rf build* && npm run build && tar -zcvf build-online.tar.gz build
scripts.pkg:online-test: rm -rf build* && npm run build:online-test && tar -zcvf build-online-test.tar.gz build
scripts.pkg:kovan: rm -rf build* && npm run build:kovan && tar -zcvf build-kovan.tar.gz build
scripts.pkg:heco: rm -rf build* && npm run build:heco && tar -zcvf build-heco.tar.gz build
scripts.pkg:heco-test: rm -rf build* && npm run build:heco-test && tar -zcvf build-heco-test.tar.gz build
scripts.pkg:bsc: rm -rf build* && npm run build:bsc && tar -zcvf build-bsc.tar.gz build
scripts.pkg:bsc-test: rm -rf build* && npm run build:bsc-test && tar -zcvf build-bsc-test.tar.gz build
